function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Restricted spaces for aerobic exercise"},{"name":"Engagement in heavy aerobic and resistance training programs without adaptation"},{"name":"Participating in physical activity during a systemic viral infection"},{"name":"Inactivity due to quarantine and social isolation"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity diversity"},{"name":"Uncontrolled progression in exercise intensity"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity due to quarantine and social isolation."},{"name":"Overexertion and injury from improper exercise technique or excessive activity."},{"name":"Lack of motivation to engage in regular exercise due to social isolation and quarantine."},{"name":"Contagious transmission of the novel sars-cov-2 coronavirus from animal species to humans"},{"name":"Recombination events in bat and pangolin-origin coronaviruses leading to the generation of new recombinants"},{"name":"Potential for mutations and evolution of the sars-cov-2 virus in human and animal hosts"},{"name":"High similarity between sars-cov-2 and bat coronaviruses"},{"name":"High mortality rates of known coronaviruses mers-cov, sars-cov"},{"name":"Asymptomatic and flu-like symptoms of sars-cov-2"},{"name":"Disrupted circadian sleep-wake rhythm leading to decreased immune defense"},{"name":"Manifestation of covid-19 as pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge on procedures to prevent the spread of sars-cov-2"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission through droplets, aerosols, and direct contact"},{"name":"Inhalation of aerosols containing pathogens"},{"name":"Transmission through direct or indirect contact with infected people or contaminated surfaces"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about the vital concentration of sars-cov-2 necessary to infect a human from inanimate surfaces"},{"name":"Lack of specific diagnostic techniques for early detection of sars-cov-2 virus"},{"name":"Inadequate screening protocols and guidelines for covid-19 testing"},{"name":"Lack of serologic tests for covid-19"},{"name":"Lack of specific treatments and vaccines for coronavirus infections"},{"name":"Use of experimental and unapproved drugs for covid-19 treatment"},{"name":"Use of drugs in treatment of sars-cov-2 infection"},{"name":"Off-label use of favipiravir for sars-cov-2 treatment"},{"name":"Investigation of new drugs for covid-19 therapy, such as tocilizumab and ace2-targeted treatments, may have unknown side effects and long-term impacts."},{"name":"Inadequate evaluation of drugs for covid-19 therapy"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 in the built environment"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with quarantine and surveillance measures"},{"name":"Trips to and from \n'red' areas with confirmed covid-19 cases"},{"name":"Selective control and measurement of body temperature"},{"name":"High number of operators within confined environments"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitization procedures"},{"name":"Close contacts between work colleagues or other staff"},{"name":"Inadequate isolation room for suspicious cases"},{"name":"Improper hand washing leading to transmission of sars-cov-2"},{"name":"Close contact with individuals suffering from acute respiratory infections"},{"name":"Touching of eyes, nose, mouth, and genitals with unwashed hands"},{"name":"Improper sneezing and coughing hygiene"},{"name":"Improper use of gloves"},{"name":"Improper glove usage leading to contamination"},{"name":"Transmission of disease through respiratory particles"},{"name":"Ineffective use of filter masks"},{"name":"Use of n95 masks with exhalation valve may not provide adequate protection from airborne particles"},{"name":"Varying filtering power of disposable surgical masks depending on the model and size of aerosol particles"},{"name":"Use of inappropriate face masks in environments potentially contaminated with sars-cov-2"}]}
